WorkItem.Description:
It appears that inn 2.2.20 "The Easiest Boss" has more restrictive settings then "The Average Boss", and I am seeing a DPS drop when switching from average to easiest boss. For instance The Average Boss is currently set to stun for 5020ms every 488s, while The Easiest Boss is set to stun for 5000ms every 37s.
Â 
~Droid
WorkItem.Summary: [BossHandler] Easiest Boss is not the easiest in 2.2.20

Comments.Message: You must have a specific content or instance filter active, cuz on All, it wouldn't have a stun (On all, it pretty much does a Patchwerk fight with a massive enrage timer). Can you tell me some more of the specific settings you are running?

I am using "Where 'Content' is 'All'". I am attaching my character sheet, yesterday it was giving weird results, but today I am getting an error dialog when I select "The Easiest Boss" that says: Error in setting DPSWarr Character settings from Boss, CB_BossList_SelectedIndexChanged() Line 35, Error Message: Value of '1000' is not valid for 'Value'. 'Value' should be between 'Minimum' and 'Maximum'...

Ya, i saw that error earlier today. I don't know why the Easiest Boss calc is suddenly getting all these values that it wasn't before. I've fixed the 1000 issue (had to put Min/Max constraints on the variables going into the boxes, honestly I wish they were designed to just handled the values coming in that were out of range as "nearest acceptable value" instead of as exceptions).

I am able to replicate this posted issue now and will work on correcting it tomorrow

Quote "I wish they were designed to just handled the values coming in that were out of range as "nearest acceptable value" instead of as exceptions".

You could always just extend that control whose behaviour you don't like and override new behaviour on your custom control couldn't you? Probs too much of extra work but a possible solution when it just gets too irritating.
You are definitely right Levva, I just hate doing that cuz I'm lazy and sometimes VS doesn't play well with overridden controls :P
